title: Not able to use a tag of a club and seems to be removed from the club
body:
I am the owner of my club and few friends of mine are in it, I used to be able to use my tag but recently it's not working since It's saying I am not a any club.
However, when I ask my friends to invite me back to the club, it says I am still in the club and the owner, but to me there isn't anything saying I am in a club or even an owner to it. 
Please fix it for me :C{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

Club Name: Hum Lun
Club Tag: Diu7U
Other members in the club: EvilSoul Rico, SDearth, candacanda77, Shodir
Can other members see your name: Yes, they said I am still the owner of the club

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support regarding this issue.
